nodes.text: The Coruscanti government was the planetary government of the Galactic Empire's capital planet, Coruscant. During the Imperial Era, the planet was represented by a senator in the Imperial Senate. By the time of the Battle of Jakku of the Galactic Civil War, Imperial Grand Vizier Mas Amedda was the leader of the government. The Coruscanti government was replaced by a New Republic provisional government following the war.
